trans-unit.source: Send a message to a control and retrieve information in lParam.

seg-source.mrk: Send a message to a control and retrieve information in lParam.

target.mrk: Send a message to a control and retrieve information in lParam.

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

seg-source.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

target.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

trans-unit.source: type of message to be send to the control as defined in the Windows controls documentation.

seg-source.mrk: type of message to be send to the control as defined in the Windows controls documentation.

target.mrk: type of message to be send to the control as defined in the Windows controls documentation.

trans-unit.source: [optional] An integer first param to be send to the control.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
An integer first param to be send to the control.

target.mrk: [optional]
An integer first param to be send to the control.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Define the type of lParam that will be returned: 0 (default) for wParam and lParam, 1 for lParam String, 2 for lParam RECT struct.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Define the type of lParam that will be returned:
0 (default) for wParam and lParam, 1 for lParam String, 2 for lParam RECT struct.

target.mrk: [optional]
Define the type of lParam that will be returned:
0 (default) for wParam and lParam, 1 for lParam String, 2 for lParam RECT struct.

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: the value returned by the SendMessage Windows API.

seg-source.mrk: the value returned by the SendMessage Windows API.

target.mrk: the value returned by the SendMessage Windows API.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: This function allows the sending of special Windows messages directly to the control using the SendMessage API. It is used to enable special control features not available with the simple GUICtrlRead() and GUICtrlUpdate... range of functions.

seg-source.mrk: This function allows the sending of special Windows messages directly to the control using the SendMessage API.
It is used to enable special control features not available with the simple GUICtrlRead() and GUICtrlUpdate... range of functions.

target.mrk: This function allows the sending of special Windows messages directly to the control using the SendMessage API.
It is used to enable special control features not available with the simple GUICtrlRead() and GUICtrlUpdate... range of functions.

trans-unit.source: If the wParam and lParamType parameters are not specified then an array of two elements is returned (LPwParam, LPlParam).

seg-source.mrk: If the wParam and lParamType parameters are not specified then an array of two elements is returned (LPwParam, LPlParam).

target.mrk: If the wParam and lParamType parameters are not specified then an array of two elements is returned (LPwParam, LPlParam).

trans-unit.source: The RECT is returned in an array of 4 elements (Left, Top, Right, Bottom).

seg-source.mrk: The RECT is returned in an array of 4 elements (Left, Top, Right, Bottom).

target.mrk: The RECT is returned in an array of 4 elements (Left, Top, Right, Bottom).
